name: Classy Classes
description: # Classy Classes Basic Classes, this kata is mainly aimed at the new JS ES6 Update introducing classes ### Task Your task is to complete this Class, the Person class has been created. You must fill in the Constructor method to accept a name as string and an age as number, complete the get Info property and getInfo method/Info getter which should return johns age is 34 ```if:javascript Reference: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Classes ``` ```if:csharp Reference: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/using-properties ``` ```if:python Reference: https://docs.python.org/3/tutorial/classes.html ```
